name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New Campaign Trail Fast Mod Loader

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small chrome extension to help developers quickly load mods into TNCT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on the icon in your extensions bar to fill in your code 1 and code 2.

Right click when you're on The New Campaign Trail site and you will have a "Load TNCT Mod" option that will automatically load your mod in.
